nodes.text: Shortly after the Battle of Yavin, the Rebels wanted to borrow Han's ship for a secret mission, but the Han refused. Later, he came to this Brown Planet on the Han ship and met Leia and Airen. The two tried to persuade Han, and eventually they persuaded him. Meanwhile, Leia and Han had a minor quarrel, and Leia hit Han's cheek. Later, Han and Chewbacca left for the Dragon Void Run race, which was part of an important mission for the Rebels. At the same time, the planet was very close to its own sun.
